channel.title: Comments for page "Chunin Exam Part 1"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Chunin Exam Part 1"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
The strategy can be adapted to guarantee a 10/10 score in order to get the trophy.

First attempt use Billy and cheat every question. For each question you should either have the answer or two remaining options.

Second attempt take Stalkergirl as an ally and if you didn't get the answer then guess one of the remaining two. If you do know the answer then pick a WRONG answer, you don't want to pass with less than 10/10 so make sure you fail this attempt. Cheat if your score is too high.

Third attempt you have all ten answers so get the trophy

item.title: Skipping
item.content:encoded: It's intresting that it is completly unmentioned on this page that you can skip this exam and pass it. I'm guessing if you choose to "skip" the exam option with Billy, you either get a random or 100% chance to complete it. In my 1st season I did it the old fashioned way, the 2nd time I choose the latter for kicks just to see the results. Passed it without paying a single ryo or trying to answer any questions.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Has anyone seen Billy give a different answer the second or third time through in the same season? In my experience, he seems to give the same answer every time.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Does anyone know the math for the score required to pass? It's not explained very well on the page. For instance, is it 5 for S1 and 6 for S2 and so on?
